title: Cisco Secure Web Appliance: Access Logs
description: The Cisco Secure Web Appliances Access logs dashboard provides detailed insights into the access logs generated by Cisco Secure Web Appliance. It includes total number of access logs, web proxy filtering activity, anti-malware engine scanning activity, identified threats and more.

definition.content:
**Dashboard Overview**

- The Cisco Secure Web Appliances Access logs dashboard provides detailed insights into the access logs generated by Cisco Secure Web Appliance. It includes total number of access logs, web proxy filtering activity, anti-malware engine scanning activity, identified threats and more.

For more information, see the [Cisco Secure Web Appliance Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/cisco_secure_web_appliance/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates Cisco Secure Web Appliance logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
